p: The main aim of this study was to identify socioeconomic risk factors associated with the rate of new diagnoses of HIV infection in Catalonia (Spain) and their spatial distribution. We performed an ecological study at the small area level based on surveillance data from the national registry of new diagnoses of HIV and publicly accessible data from the Agency of Health Quality and Evaluation of Catalonia and the Information System for the Development of Research in Primary Care. We also assessed the effect of the number of gay locations in the neighborhood.
